qas.question: What was the number of team Barcelona supporters by 1922?
How many people could Camp de Les Corts hold?
After several expansions how many people could the stadium hold?
When was the last expansion of Les Corts?

context: In 1922, the number of supporters had surpassed <a0_0>20,000<a0_0/> and by lending money to the club, Barça was able to build the larger <a1_0>Camp de Les Corts<a1_0/>, which had an initial capacity of <a2_0>20,000<a2_0/> spectators. After the Spanish Civil War the club started attracting more members and a larger number of spectators at matches. This led to several expansion projects: the grandstand in 1944, the southern stand in 1946, and finally the northern stand in <a4_0>1950<a4_0/>. After the last expansion, Les Corts could hold <a3_0>60,000<a3_0/> spectators.
